name: Wagyu Ribeye Steak
description: Premium Wagyu ribeye served with red wine sauce and mashed potatoes.

name: Grilled Lamb Chops
description: Tender lamb chops with rosemary sauce and roasted potatoes.

name: Seafood Paella
description: Spanish-style rice dish with mussels, shrimp, and calamari.

name: Lobster Truffle Pasta
description: Fresh pasta with lobster and creamy truffle sauce.

name: Thai Green Curry with Lobster
description: Thai green curry with fresh lobster, served with jasmine rice.

name: Miso Black Cod
description: Miso-marinated black cod served with grilled vegetables.

name: Surf & Turf
description: Premium steak paired with grilled tiger prawns, served with butter lemon sauce.

name: Herb-Crusted Salmon
description: Salmon fillet crusted with fresh herbs, served with asparagus and lemon butter sauce.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: Classic French beef stew braised in red wine with mushrooms and carrots.

name: Duck Confit
description: Slow-cooked duck leg served with roasted potatoes and a balsamic glaze.

name: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: Layers of fresh pasta with spinach, ricotta, and marinara sauce.

name: Chicken Parmigiana
description: Crispy chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella, served with pasta.

name: Pan-Seared Tuna
description: Fresh tuna steak seared to perfection, served with a soy sesame glaze.

name: Steak Frites
description: Juicy steak served with crispy fries and béarnaise sauce.

name: Grilled Octopus
description: Char-grilled octopus served with citrus and herb dressing.

name: Stuffed Chicken Breast
description: Chicken breast stuffed with spinach, ricotta, and sun-dried tomatoes, served with garlic mashed potatoes.

name: Veal Saltimbocca
description: Veal cutlets with prosciutto and sage, served with roasted vegetables.

name: Seared Scallops
description: Delicate scallops seared and served with lemon beurre blanc.

name: Beef Wellington
description: Tender beef fillet wrapped in puff pastry with mushrooms and foie gras.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Pasta baked with marinara sauce, mozzarella, and ricotta cheese.

name: Lamb Shank
description: Slow-cooked lamb shank served with root vegetables and rosemary sauce.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter sauce, served over linguine.

name: Pork Belly
description: Slow-roasted pork belly with a crispy crackling, served with apple puree.

name: Truffle Soup
description: Truffle soup is a rich, aromatic dish made with truffles, cream, and savory broth. It offers a luxurious, earthy flavor, often garnished with fresh truffles or croutons
